name: Starch-Trek: Deep Spud Nine
description:
Controls:
Left/Right Arrow: Run
Spacebar: Jump
Left Click: Dig
Right Click: Super Jump (Costs 3 seconds of time.)

Spacebar:  Move to next screen on Title Screen, Victory Screen, and Game Over screen.

Objective: Collect enough potatoes and return to your Space House before the timer runs out.

Story: Join Captain James Tuberius Kirk on his quest to dig where no man has dug before and gather potatoes to tide him over during Space Winter.  Continue your journey to the end to get sweet, sweet potato facts.

Tip: The game can be completed by itself with no tricks, but there are some hidden strategies.  Ways to dig multiple blocks both horizontally and vertically for example (although you only have the ability to dig straight down).

Credits: 
Character Art and Block Art: Caiden Curry. Check out his other art here:
https://www.artstation.com/caidencurry
Programming, Concept, Design:  GrayHato
Additional Credits Coming soon.
